name: Brianlinuxing.GitHub.io
tagline: Brian Linuxing, decades of opinions and experience at your fingertips!
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub site

I am rather fond of Github thus decided to host my thoughts on it.

### Technology

I have been using computers and technology since the early 1970s. I have done the lot: managed Mainframes, set-up Datacentres, coded in Assembler (MACRO-10), FORTRAN, COBOL, etc the whole ball of wax!

### Linux

I prefer to use and do Linux, whenever I can, having started with Slackware in 1994.

### Ideas and a critical eye

After 30+ years of IT I see the world differently and brim with ideas on how to do to things better, smarter and with less hassle. I provide a high degree of objectivity on modern problems and issues. Ask me a question!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
